hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux source $OMERO_INSTALL/settings.env OMERO_DB_NAME='idr-20160803' OMERO_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.server
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero admin stop || echo First build sleep 5 #dropdb -h $OMERO_DB_HOST -U $OMERO_DB_USER $OMERO_DB_NAME || echo First run
# remove symlink if [ -L $WORKSPACE/data/Thumbnails ]; then rm $WORKSPACE/data/Thumbnails fi if [ -L $WORKSPACE/data/FullText ]; then rm $WORKSPACE/data/FullText fi
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/*

OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux source $OMERO_INSTALL/settings.env OMERO_DB_NAME='idr-20160803' OMERO_DATA_DIR=$WORKSPACE/data
mkdir -p $OMERO_DATA_DIR
# copy thumbnails ln -s $HOME/Thumbnails/ $WORKSPACE/data/Thumbnails ln -s $HOME/FullText/ $WORKSPACE/data/FullText
# UNZIP SERVER OMERO_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.server
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_DIST
## LOAD CONFIG
# LOAD EXTRA CONFIG #$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero load configfile.omero $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.client.ui.menu.dropdown.colleagues.enabled false $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.client.ui.menu.dropdown.everyone.label 'Demo data' $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.client.ui.tree.type_order false $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.client.ui.tree.orphans.enabled false
# DEFAULT CONFIG $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.db.name $OMERO_DB_NAME $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.db.host $OMERO_DB_HOST $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.db.user $OMERO_DB_USER $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.data.dir $OMERO_DATA_DIR
## END LOAD CONFIG
## PURGE
# CREATE DB #createdb -h $OMERO_DB_HOST -U $OMERO_DB_USER $OMERO_DB_NAME #$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero db script -f dbsetup.sql "" "" $OMERO_ROOT_PASS #psql -h $OMERO_DB_HOST -U $OMERO_DB_USER -d $OMERO_DB_NAME -f dbsetup.sql #rm dbsetup.sql
## END PURGE
BUILD_ID=DONT_KILL_ME $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero admin start
# WAIT FOR OMERO TO START UP AND ACCEPT CONNECTIONS $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero admin waitup
